Alien Swarm is a freeware multiplayer top-down shooter video game created by Valve Corporation.

The game plot is not the best but the game is fun to play with some friends.

The best classes in my opinion are: 
1st - Tech
2nd - Medic
3rd - Official
4th - Special Guns
I don't know why this is free, but i'm not complaining!

All in all, it's a fun game. The controls can be a bit confusing, but the most important controls are easy to get the hang of. Basic controls (moving and shooting) are easy, but the complicated stuff like hacking and healing is harder. The music and voice acting is well-done, as is the sound design. Sometimes it's hard to believe this is on the Source Engine, but it is, just a different perspective than you might be used to. (Then again, so is Dota 2, but I don't play that.)

Since this game is free, I recommend downloading it and practicing with bots first, then go online and play two games with humans to get your Team Fortress 2 hat. You're bound to get a few fun achievements along the way. I'll probably return to this game again in the future; it's not too shabby.

2021 edit: I've learned that one map counts as a "game" for the achievement. Most people, I think, quit out after they've completed the first two missions of the Jacob's Rest campaign, since by that time, they've gotten the TF2 hat. But you should keep playing! To get the full story, you need to play all six of the maps of the Jacob's Rest campaign. (I wish I knew why it was called that. Maybe the PDAs you can read have lore bits?)

Alien Swarm is the best example of a great game, with great potential, that still fails because of the ones behind it.

Gameplaywise it is just brilliant. Really fun and really great to play with your friends. Officially there's only one campaign unfortunately, but the community is full of fan-made campaigns. It really is worth playing even only for one playthrough of the official campaign. 

Keep in mind that the population is quite low though, but there's a good reason for that:
There's a better and newer version of Alien Swarm, by someone else, relaunched as Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop, also for free, also available on Steam. It is 100% the same game, but the way it should be. With more campaigns, updates, PVP, support and also everything there already is available here. So if you like Alien Swarm, you should really play Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop.

Empezando desde 0 este juego ofrece varias posibilidades como clases , entre las cuales hay 4, y un sistema de niveles que a la vez va desbloqueando diferentes armas y objetos. Los mapas son bastante variados , aunque siempre con esa ambientación creepy de pelicula de terror estipo alien vs predator la verdad , a mi gusto para ser un juego free to play ofrece bastante e incluso se puede correr gratamente en una pc de baja gama, o vieja , para jugar con amigos la verdad que es perfecto y te va a brindar bastantes horas.

Комментарий: Меня хватило на 2 прохождения игры так же хочу заметить, что игра с реальными людьми и при наличии связи становится крайне увлекательной.
Плюсы:
-Есть кооператив
-Хороший сюжет
-Отличная атмосфера
-Широкий выбор оружия и персонажей
-Интересный гемплей
-Шансы на выживание повышаются при наличии живого напарника
-Игра бесплатная
Минусы:
-Оружие открывается с уровнем из-за чего чтобы открыть последнее оружие нужно перепроходить игру по несколько раз или проходить на высоких сложностях
-Очень трудно играть одному
-Быстро проходится
-Мало классов
-Текст игры на Английском языке

Alien Swarm ist ein meiner Meinung nach sehr guter Coop-Top Down Shooter welcher sich perfekt dafür eignet am Abend mit seinen Freunden zu spielen oder mal ein bischen mit Köpfchen ranzugehen wenn man die höheren Schwierigkeitsgrade angeht.Da das Spiel auf der Source Engine basiert läuft es Problemlos auf jedem Rechner und sieht für ein Free2 Play Spiel sogar noch ganz gut aus.

This game is one of the best games out there for top down shooters. Very comparable to Helldivers but even more exciting because it brings along with it a very high level of suspense and "oh crap" moments which all happen in a split second whereas with Helldivers you sort of see that coming. I absolutely love this game and the level up system designed to it. I haven't tried it but I'm going to see if I can't play this with my playstation 4 controller and mouse and keyboard and team up with my wife and kill some aliens together. If I can't please please make that an option I would easily pay 20 dollars for this game to be full up and if it had around 30 or more levels I would pay 60. Absolutely Brilliant!
